website_summaries.verdict: You'll always have the right saw for the job with this 28-piece set from Milwaukee. Just as long as the job involves metal, wood, or PVC rather than concrete.
pros: Includes 22 hole saws measuring from 3/4 to 4-3/4 inches
Matrix II bi-metal construction for greater durability
Offers unique precision-ground tooth geometry for faster cutting.Positive rake angle for aggressive cutting
Radiused back face to reduce stress on teeth
cons: Residue can make it difficult to disassemble after use

customer_reviews.title: I Love Milwaukee products there is no comparison with the cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. I Love Milwaukee products there is no comparison with the cheap Chinese nockoffs. I have their carbide tip hole saw set and these use the same arbor. I also use their quick change extentions (sweet). These work better for fine work where you need a cleaner hole. like drilling through cabinets and such.. less catastrophic blowout. I use them with my old D handle right angle drill from 20 years ago.. Maybe ill buy one of the new SuperHawgs when they have a promotion at my local Plumbing supply house.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Need a whole lot of holes cut, this is the set for YOU
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Handyman, contractor, installer or just need hole saws for the projects you are working on THIS IS THE SET YOU NEED!! WOW this set for the price is totally awesome! There is no comparison to any hole saw sets I have owned 9/16' thru 4 1/2" all in one place Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Handyman247 LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great set of hole saws to have.
customer_reviews.text: This has been super handy and the Milwaukee quality is there. They're not carbide hole saws so be careful what you're going into but they do the job around the house. And I have all the sizes that I could ever possibly need. The case is well organized, compact, and sturdy enough to ride around in a truck bed on the way to a job. Made in the USA is a big plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: simpledj509

customer_reviews.title: Extra-large Assortment at an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a similar set stolen from the worksite :( A very nice update makes the slug FAR, FAR easier to remove from the saw. These are very durable hole saws provided they are not used for things like cement board or metals of any type or thickness. The seller shipped immediately and I received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Thies

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: Product is overrated Doesn’t perform as advertised . Dulls very easy Not designed for commercial use . Be a great hobbyist tool but we’ve tested it in our business w poor results.
customer_reviews.author: billy tyler

customer_reviews.title: works great. I have the carbide hole saw set too
customer_reviews.text: works great. I have the carbide hole saw set too. These bite better than those but if there is allot of nails and what not you are better to start with one of these and follow through with the carbide. Milwaukee has always been very good about warrenties too
customer_reviews.author: Bolduc Builders

customer_reviews.title: Cut great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time this week to cut a 2 1/8" hole in a solid wood door for the door knob. It cut very nice, I liked how the center bit connected. Hopefully it will last. So far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Fudd

customer_reviews.title: Case broken in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Tools are probably great, but the storage box was damaged upon arrival. I didnt need it right away so I didnt open it until past the return period. Either way, it is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have set. Paying for each of these items individually would cost more than this set. It has most everything you need unless you need a bigger hole saw, something like 5" or bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Altemoos

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: They work fast through metal but burn up fairly fast, and drill slow through thicker wood, i.e. 2x's but last longer. But every size from 4.5" down.
customer_reviews.author: Marek S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Ice Hardened and no warranty according to Milwaukee.
customer_reviews.text: These are not Ice Hardened as advertised. Check them out on Milwaukee’s website. They say nothing about them being ice hardened. I even called Milwaukee. They also said the limited life-time warranty is not valid on this set purchased from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the different sizes in this kit. Cuts like butter. Very durable and comes in a great case. Just what you would expect from Milwaukee tools.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Can't get over the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Having now used several of the hole saws I've found them to be much better quality than I was expecting for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Not for metal
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set as long as you don't need to drill any kind of metal. I gave this one star because a hole saw should be able to drill through some metal. Great for sheet rock even butter,but ag steel you might get one hole. They wear out too fast!!!!

customer_reviews.title: When You Need a Hole Saw Buy This Set

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set

customer_reviews.text: Great product from a great brand. I bought the large set because of the wider selection of hole saw sizes.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great set for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a awesome set. It is perfect for what I do in electrical and plumbing.

customer_reviews.title: very good quality tools and case
customer_reviews.text: every hole saw blade you need is in this case. its not meant for thick steel or commercial work. but working residential its perfect. the case makes it very easy to get the size you need quick.

customer_reviews.text: This set has been great. Has everything you need when you need it.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and they were here at my doorstep quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MikeinMac

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set!
customer_reviews.text: Had to save my pennies to buy this set but am very happy with it. Using it to make holes in 3/16 mild steel. The saws I have used so far seem to be holding up well after 20-25 holes. Worth the wait and the money!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Remington

customer_reviews.title: Great Saws, Great collection and very good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 4 3/4" hole saw for a floor outlet box. I needed a 2 1/8" hole saw for a lockset. Found both sizes and many more in this collection. Both times that I have used these saws, I was impressed. For the money, I did not find a better selection of sizes. Both large and small chucks are included and the case organizes things wonderfully. I don't believe that anyone with a need for multiple sizes would be disappointed in this set.
customer_reviews.author: WMG

customer_reviews.title: AAfairy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my husband for Christmas and he was thrilled. Not long after Christmas my husband needed to drill a hole in some heavy metal. Before it would have taken him forever, but he came and told me how fast he drilled the hole with one of these hole saw bits. He couldn't believe it and is thoroughly impressed. We are sold on Milwaukee products anyway, and this is just one more example of a great product. I also feel I got a good deal on Amazon. That is where I have purchased all of my Milwaukee gifts for him. Hard to beat Amazon's price and free shipping, I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Six stars..
customer_reviews.text: Great product & price.. Unbelievable delivery time, one week ahead of the scheduled two weeks..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice almost Great
customer_reviews.text: Have been doing some heavy duty home improvement and this tool set should meet any reasonable need for cutting a round hole in wood or sheetrock. PRO: Buy it if you need to have a complete set and want to have a quality set to cut with. Nice case easy to store items and find the right one) CON: Dis-assembly of cutter with fixture can been problematic after use. (The heat, dust, white coating being scraped off can get things sticky to remove) Would (wood) buy again as a good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hole saw kit
customer_reviews.text: More saw blades than I will probably ever need but then "the right tool for the right job" won out. Quite hefty kit but has saved me a trip twice already :)
customer_reviews.author: R & R

customer_reviews.title: More is better
customer_reviews.text: Never have the right bits to do the job. "Not no more". There more size's in this kit to do the job's that I run into on a daily business. I could not be more please, only wish that I had bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: installer #1

customer_reviews.title: ... made products and we are finding their tools mostly amazing. Go Milwaukee
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee is one of the few companies making quality USA made products and we are finding their tools mostly amazing. Go Milwaukee, keep building high quality American designed and constructed tools. Buy the best once and enjoy and save money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I'm and electrician and I love the Milwaukee hole saws
customer_reviews.text: I'm and electrician and I love the Milwaukee hole saws. I got tired of buying the sizes I needed individually and $159 was a good price for this size kit.

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee hole saw kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for the money and it is pretty much complete for doing electrical and plumbing and some construction projects for a compact set.I have had very good luck with the Milwaukee blades staying sharp compared to some of the other brands.Great for the contractor but a bit pricey for the average Joe. NICE KIT !!!

customer_reviews.text: Great hole saw set. You need hole saws? Look no further. Have cut wood, 3/4" steel plate, sheet metal, they cut it all. You want these.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great to cut the gauge holes for my custom dash. I like the storage box too.

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 49-22-4185 All Purpose Professional Ice Hardened Hole Saw Kit 28 Piece
product_meta.description:
The product is easy to use

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Milwaukee Electric Tool Corporation introduces Ice Hardened hole saws, a new generation of hole saws that offer up to 50% longer life than the competition and are ideal for metal and wood cutting in a wide variety of HVAC, electrical, plumbing and maintenance/repair applications. Milwaukee Ice Hardened products utilize a proprietary cryogenic hardening process that improves upon traditional heat treat processes. Unlike surface coatings that wear away, cryogenics harden to the core by minimizing soft metal (austenite) and creating more hard metal (martensite). The result is a product that is more consistently hard throughout, resulting in life up to 50% longer than the competition. Milwaukee Ice Hardened hole saws also feature Matrix II bi-metal construction for greater durability and a unique precision-ground tooth geometry for faster cutting. A positive rake angle cuts more aggressively while deeper gullets quickly remove chips. A radiused back face reduces stress on the teeth, ensuring that the blade delivers optimum life and speed. Functional slot geometry allows for a standard slotted screwdriver to fit completely underneath the plug for easier plug removal. Kit Includes: Twenty-two (22) hole saws: 3/4", 7/8", 1", 1-1/8", 1-1/4", 1-3/8", 1-1/2", 1-3/4", 2", 2-1/8", 2-1/4", 2-1/2", 2-5/8", 3", 3-1/4", 3-3/8", 3-5/8", 3-3/4", 4-1/8", 4-1/4", 4-1/2", 4-3/4"; Three (3) arbors: 49-56-7000, 49-56-7010, 49-56-9100; Three (3) drill bits: 49-56-8010; Space for additional hole saws
feature_bullets: The product is easy to use
The product is manufactured in United States
ICE HARDENED for up to 50% longer life than the competition
Matrix II Bi-Metal Teeth for greater durability
Positive Rake Angle for fast cutting
Radiused Tooth Back reduces stress on teeth
Deeper Gullets for fast chip removal and Funtional Slot Geometry provides easy plug removal
